channel.title: LongWonderScape
channel.description:
Okay so i wanna create a server, i know how to do about everything for one, but i find it very boring to do by myself, so im looking for 1 person or 2 just to help out and help find stuff, help code here and there and help host and get players once opened. this will take awhile to do and i expect the person to be able to be online quite a bit. if youd like to help me do this, then ple msg me on hotmail or email me at [email]longwonderscape@hotmail.com[/email] on messanger or if you are to post it as a reply to this or email, then post this/ send this, ALSO ill be looking for people for web design :D :) ;)
Job Title: website designer or coder or hoster [u][b][i]What can you do: How long you can be on a day: What do you want out of this: Are you willing to help pay for vps: Can you get players once opened:[/i][/b][/u]
Thank you everyone that looks at this and would like to help, have a good day and remember this is not a server yet started, i can code and will code most of it, id just like to have help and help gettin people and pay for hosting and find bugs and find bettter ways to code it and a website designer, thank you have a good day

item.title: LongWonderScape
item.dc:creator: @pildurass pildurass
item.description:
@pildurass wrote:

Not help with coding i am slowly making a team and we hve a development team of 3 atm one is working on gfx one is working on client sided coding specifically, i am lead developer coding castle wars atm. I have made this from a scratch project insanity server and tbh its boss, i am looking for coders to help me now as i am making this really good, lagg free and anti-cheatclient i have released the part of the server that i had code an made 250 dollars of which im going to invest into this server. As it will be makig lots of money an will have alot of people i want it to be perfect and am gathering a team. Sure if you want to help out that would be great!!

Read full topic
